page.title: 17 LOCAL INTERESTS
page.content: RECONSTRUCTION OF OLD BARN AT BINFIELD HEATH:Sited next to the Bottle and Glass public house are the remains of Bourne's Farm Barn, which is timber framed and has been empty for many years. A detailed survey two years ago found it to be in poor condition. Conservationists feel that there is a need for greater awareness of barns and their importance in the landscape. It is probable that the barn was attached to a farm house which is now the Bottle and Glass and that they were already brewing beer for travellers between Henley and Caversham; many rural public houses started like this. BARN CONVERTION:The Oxfordshire Buildings Preservation Trust (which is a division of the Council for the Preservation of Rural England Trust) has made a bid to save a beautiful ...
